full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN BSTEN PA'I TSUL RNAM PAR BSHAD PA DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @028B CES DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN BSTEN PA'I TSUL RNAM PAR BSHAD PA DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI SLOB RNAMS KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA DANG, SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA'I BSAM PAS KUN NAS BSLANGS TE, ^BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI GSUNG GI BDUD RTZIS CUNG ZAD 'TSO BA'I BAN RGAN GYI NA BA SKAL BZANG YE SHES KYIS, ^BLA MA'I GSUNG BZHIN SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BZANG PO DPAL GYIS BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG BDAG GZHAN 'GRO KUN TSE RABS THAMS @029A *, ,CAD DU BLA MAS RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,SVA STI, DGE TSOGS KUN 'BYUNG BSHES GNYEN BSTEN TSUL RNAM BSHAD 'DI, DGE MTHUN 'BYOR LDAN DGE BSHES BLO BZANG 'OD ZER GYIS, DGE LDAN BSTAN RGYAS GLING DU YON SBYAR PAR DU BSGRUBS, ,DGE BAS SKAL BZANG RANG CAG TSE GCIG MCHOG 'GRUB SHOG , ,,DZA YANTU, ,
